description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Appointed Mr. K. R. M. N. Lawrence, Mr. R. S. Ariyapperuma to arbitrate the Industrial Disputes between Mr. D. T. Leelaratne and Sri Lanka Transport Board; between Mrs. Padma Weragodaarachchi and Associated Newspapers of Ceylon Ltd., and between Mr. B. H. A. Cyril Gunaratne and Ceylon Electricity Board, respectively
